item.description:
Hello All,

  It is that time of year once again, and to get everyone in the spirit of giving, we are lowering our guest fee to $10 (50% off) for this meeting.

  Bring plenty of business cards and lets all start off 2012 with a whole list of potential business partners and clients.  We hope that you will join us for our Holiday Celebration!

Our Event will include:  CPA Joe Craft
Prize and 50/50 Raffles
Games/Networking
Guests Only $10 and get a Free Raffle Ticket
NEREIA Holiday Networking Event!    December 7th, 2011
Doors Open @ 6:30pm 
We look forward to seeing you there! 
To pre-pay your attendance fee for this meeting or for more information please check out our website at: www.newenglandreia.com
Ask about getting YOUR membership today so you can enjoy all the Benefits!

Check our website for the updated speaker schedule. www.newenglandreia.com


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month
Admission Fees

Guests: $10.00 at the Door for the Holiday Networking Event!
 


Ask about getting YOUR membership today! 

www.newenglandreia.com
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: New England Real Estate Investors - Holiday Networking Event
